summary: This mod adds a perk called Chronomancy to the end of the Alteration skill tree. It gives you the spells (and allows you to use them). To get this perk you must first have the Master Alteration perk. P.S. THIS MOD IS BY NO MEANS BALANCED! So if you want a non-slightly OP time magic mod, look elsewhere.
descriptionHtml:
ADDED SPELLS

SEE VERSION 4 CHANGELOG BELOW!

End Time Control: A Lesser Power that allows you to end your control over time.

Reversal: A Lesser Power that allows you to rewind time around your body, healing all damage you have taken.

Slow Time: Use magicka to slow down the flow of time.

Time Stop: Use magicka to bring the constant flow of time to a halt.

Temporal Ward: Form a shield of pure temporal energy directly in front of you.

Singularity Blast: Manipulate gravity into a solid wave and hurl it at your foes. (Forgot to change the description of the spell...so you'll have to make one up.)

Quantum Weaving: Weave temporal energy into your armor making it incredibly resilient.

Stasis: Imprison an enemy in a shell of hardend temporal energy.

Space-Time Warp Spells.
(These allow you to teleport to all of the nine holds, Soltheim, Blackreach, The Tower of Mzark, Castle Volkihar (Exterior), and Castle Dawnguard (Exterior).
P.S. The other spells you see in the screenshots are from Apocalypse Magic, They are not mine and ARE NOT part of my mod, just as my mod is not part of Apocalypse Magic. The Dark Souls knight armor isn't mine or used in this mod either and all credits(and rights) go to the original creators.

VERSION 4 ChangeLog!!!
-packed the scripts into a BSA file. Now all you have to do is extract it and the ESP to Skyrims Data Folder and you will be good to go.

-The spells can be aquired via the perk OR via the chest in Qasmoke. You will have to activate the Ornate Pedestal to get the chest to appear.

-Changed the name of the Gravity Wave spell to Singularity Wave. Its still under the Destruction tab, just lower down the list.
author: 9OZaA AKA Caldizar The Master of Reality
